boat.construction_details: Carvel Pitch pine planking on oak frames
boat.full_description: Blue Jacket appears in Lloyd’s in about 1920 with the ex-name ‘Helen’  recorded. In the 1930’s she was purchased by Uffa Fox for his publisher  and was recorded in Fox’s book ‘Thoughts on Yachts and Yachting’ of 1938  in which there is a chapter dedicated to her. She was rescued from a  bermudan-rigged state in 1983 and taken to the East Coast for some  years. Her current owner bought Blue Jacket in 2004 and returned her to open working  boat format, as close to original as was possible with the available  information.
boat.name: Blue Jacket
boat.short_description: Blue Jacket was built at Itchen in 1894
